item.title: EarthLink Offers Healthcare IT Resources
item.description:
The potential for healthcare automation to significantly reduce costs in healthcare settings like doctor’s offices, clinics, and hospitals is substantial. However, not all healthcare providers have the necessary IT capabilities to modernize and leverage these new technologies. They might also struggle to meet privacy regulations like HIPAA. This is where large network service providers such as EarthLink Business can bridge the gap. An example of this can be seen in how EarthLink supports Monadnock Community Hospital in Peterborough, New Hampshire, as shown in this video...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/earthlink-offers-healthcare-it-resources/
